# Shiba Inu Documentation - Complete Ecosystem Overview

## Introduction
Shiba Inu is a comprehensive blockchain ecosystem built around the SHIB token, featuring multiple products and services including Shibarium (Layer 2), Shib Alpha Layer, ShibaSwap (DEX), Metaverse, Staking, Bridge, and more.

## Core Products & Services

### 1. Shibarium (Layer 2)
- **Description**: Ethereum Layer 2 scaling solution incubated by Shib.io
- **Network Details**:
  - Network name: Shibarium
  - RPC URL: https://rpc.shibrpc.com
  - Explorer URL: https://shibariumscan.io
  - Chain ID: 109
  - Currency symbol: BONE
- **Key Benefits**:
  - Low gas fees and fast transaction processing
  - Global payments and financial services
  - Creator monetization through NFTs and digital assets
  - Comprehensive builder support with Ethereum compatibility
  - Access to large, passionate user base
- **Architecture**: Proof-of-Stake (PoS) with Heimdall and Bor layers
- **Use Cases**: DeFi, NFTs, gaming, payments, creator economy

### 2. Shib Alpha Layer
- **Description**: Decentralized shared sequencer and interoperability protocol powered by Elder
- **Key Features**:
  - Seamless Web2-like experience with decentralization
  - Single account system for multiple RollApps
  - Instant confirmations with inclusion finalities
  - Enhanced interoperability for cross-chain operations
  - Self-reinforcing ecosystem growth cycle
- **Benefits**: Accessibility, efficiency, security, growth catalyst
- **Architecture**: Cosmos SDK and CometBFT based
- **Use Cases**: Rollup infrastructure, cross-chain messaging, shared sequencing
- **Documentation**: Located in `/alpha-layer/` directory

### 3. ShibaSwap (Decentralized Exchange)
- **Description**: DEX available on both Ethereum and Shibarium networks
- **Versions**:
  - **ShibaSwap v1**: Classic AMM with simple liquidity provision
  - **ShibaSwap v2**: Advanced concentrated liquidity with NFT positions
- **Features**:
  - Token swapping across networks
  - Liquidity provision (LP tokens for v1, NFT positions for v2)
  - Yield farming with BONE rewards (Ethereum only)
  - Cross-chain trading between Ethereum and Shibarium
- **Fee Structure**: v1 (0.3% fixed), v2 (0.05%, 0.3%, 1% tiers)
- **Supported Networks**: Ethereum Mainnet, Shibarium

### 4. Bridge System
- **Description**: Secure cross-chain bridges between Ethereum and Shibarium
- **Bridge Types**:
  - **PoS Bridge**: Flexible, 15min deposit, 30min withdrawal, supports ETH/ERC20/ERC721/ERC1155
  - **Plasma Bridge**: Rigid, 15min deposit, 1hr withdrawal, supports ETH/ERC20/ERC721 only
- **Security**: Trustless bi-directional transactions with 1:1 token pegging
- **Features**: State Sync mechanism, checkpoint transactions, circulating supply preservation

### 5. Shib: The Metaverse
- **Description**: Virtual world for creativity and social interaction
- **Key Features**:
  - Avatar Builder: Customizable digital identities
  - Plot Builder: Virtual real estate using Metaverse Land NFTs
  - Social Interaction: Chat, voice communication, community events
  - Exploration: Multiple hubs and interactive spaces
- **System Requirements**: Windows 11, Intel i7/AMD Ryzen 5, 32GB RAM, 50GB storage, RTX 3060/RX 6600 XT
- **Status**: Early access, evolving platform

### 6. Bury 2.0 (Staking Platform)
- **Description**: Advanced staking platform for governance participation
- **Supported Tokens**: SHIB, TREAT, LEASH, BONE
- **Features**:
  - Vote-escrowed (veToken) system for governance power
  - Flexible lock periods: 1 week to 4 years
  - Auto-decay voting power over time
  - Early withdrawal penalty: 30%
- **Current Status**: Beta, voting power only (rewards coming soon)
- **Network**: Shibarium (Chain ID: 109)

### 7. Shib Name Service (SNS)
- **Description**: Web3 digital identity system with multichain support
- **Key Features**:
  - Multichain wallet addresses using *SHIB format
  - Cross-platform identity across DeFi, SocialFi, GameFi
  - Infrastructure identifiers for smart contracts and nodes
  - dApp access using Shib Names
- **Integration**: D3 blockchain for DomainFi
- **Benefits**: Universal identity, enhanced security, future-proof design

### 8. Shib DAO (Decentralized Governance)
- **Description**: Comprehensive DAO ecosystem for community governance
- **Architecture**: Dual-layer governance system
- **Token Types**:
  - **BONE**: Primary governance and staking token
  - **LEASH**: Limited supply premium token
  - **TREAT**: Rewards and utility token
  - **SHIB**: Foundation token
- **DAO Types**:
  - **Doggy DAOs**: Official ecosystem DAOs (BONE, TREAT, SHIB, LEASH)
  - **Community DAOs**: Grassroots community-created DAOs
- **Features**: Token-weighted voting, karma-based privileges, gasless governance

## Build Tools & SDKs

### APIs & Data
- **RPC Connection**: Standard Ethereum JSON-RPC API
- **Base URLs**: 
  - Shibarium: https://api.shibrpc.com/shibarium/
  - Puppynet: https://api.shibrpc.com/puppynet/
- **On-Chain Data API**: Comprehensive blockchain data access
- **Crypto Payments**: Payment processing solutions

### Development Tools
- **Shib Paymaster**: Gas fee management
- **ShibaSwap SDKs**: v1 and v2 SDKs for DEX integration
- **Alpha Layer Hardhat Plugin**: Development framework
- **Elder.js**: JavaScript library for Elder protocol
- **Elder Wrap**: Wrapper utilities
- **Node Running**: Tools for running Shibarium nodes

## Network Information

### Shibarium Mainnet
- **Chain ID**: 109
- **RPC URL**: https://rpc.shibrpc.com
- **Explorer**: https://shibariumscan.io
- **Currency**: BONE
- **Consensus**: Proof-of-Stake

### Puppynet Testnet
- **Purpose**: Development and testing environment
- **RPC URL**: https://api.shibrpc.com/puppynet/
- **Access**: Requires API key from Developer Portal

## Ecosystem Tokens

### SHIB Token
- **Purpose**: Foundation token of the ecosystem
- **Use Cases**: Base governance participation, ecosystem foundation

### BONE Token
- **Purpose**: Primary governance and staking token
- **Use Cases**: Shibarium validator staking, main governance decisions
- **Network**: Shibarium native token

### LEASH Token
- **Purpose**: Limited supply premium token
- **Use Cases**: Enhanced governance rights, special ecosystem features
- **Supply**: Limited quantity

### TREAT Token
- **Purpose**: Rewards and utility token
- **Use Cases**: Rewards distribution, future ecosystem features

## Use Cases & Applications

### Financial Services
- Global payments and remittances
- Microtransactions
- DeFi protocols (lending, yield farming)
- Cross-chain trading

### Creator Economy
- NFT marketplaces and trading
- Digital collectibles
- Artist and musician monetization
- Creator revenue streams

### Gaming & Metaverse
- Virtual real estate
- Avatar customization
- Social interaction platforms
- GameFi applications

### Developer Ecosystem
- dApp development and deployment
- Smart contract deployment
- Cross-chain application building
- Rollup infrastructure

## Technical Architecture

### Shibarium Architecture
- **Heimdall**: Validator layer for consensus
- **Bor**: Block producer layer
- **PoS Manager**: Staking and validator management
- **Plasma Contracts**: Security mechanism for bridge

### Shib Alpha Layer Architecture
- **Elder Protocol**: Decentralized shared sequencer
- **Cosmos SDK**: Application framework
- **CometBFT**: Consensus engine
- **Transaction Flow**: Optimized sequencing and finality

### Security Features
- **Proof-of-Stake**: Validator-based security
- **Plasma Security**: Ethereum-backed bridge security
- **Censorship Resistance**: Decentralized governance
- **Cross-Chain Security**: Multiple bridge types for different security needs

## Legal & Compliance

### Policies
- **Privacy Policy**: Comprehensive data protection
- **Terms of Service**: Platform usage terms
- **Cookie Policy**: Cookie usage and management

### Governance
- **Transparent On-Chain Governance**: All decisions recorded on blockchain
- **Community-Driven**: Token holder participation in key decisions
- **Multi-Strategy Voting**: Flexible governance mechanisms

## Development & Deployment

### Getting Started
1. **Build dApps**: Deploy applications on Shibarium
2. **Launch Tokens**: Create new tokens on the network
3. **Deploy Contracts**: Smart contract development and deployment
4. **Launch Rollups**: Create custom Layer 2 solutions

### Tools & SDKs
- **Hardhat Integration**: Development framework support
- **Web3.js Support**: Standard Ethereum tooling compatibility
- **API Access**: Comprehensive data and RPC endpoints
- **Faucet**: Testnet token distribution

This comprehensive ecosystem provides a complete Web3 platform for developers, users, and creators, with emphasis on accessibility, security, and community-driven governance.
